profile:
Founded in 1997, Maher Construction had become a full service management and construction company that includes new construction, interior fit-outs, construction management, interior design and architectural services.  Maher Construction has built a reputation on, and is committed to, working within the budget, ensuring that all projects are completed as per scope and schedule, and delivering the highest quality of work and service to our clients.

Each project is given personal attention by its principal Larry Maher. By maintaining an open line of communication with each member of the project and providing a leadership role throughout the construction phase, Maher Construction ensures the integrity and quality of each phase of the project. As a result, we are proud of our extensive list of repeat clients.

Our continued success is also due to our long-term relationships with clients, sub-trade contractors, consultants and employees.

profile:
Residential/Commercial renovation and handyman services for any project.

Our Services are available:
- Anywhere in the GTA
- Anytime of the day or week
- Fully Insured (up to for $5,000,000) and Licensed 
- Always Punctual, Detailed and Professional

Our Past Projects Included:
- Full Home Renovation
- Kitchen and Bathroom Remodelling
- Millwork and Carpentry
- Waterproofing and Tiling
- Plumbing (Performed by licensed Plumber)
- Electrical Work (Performed by licensed Electrician)
- Drywall, Taping and Sanding
- Framing and Insulation
- Painting and Staining
- HVAC
- Landscaping
- Other 

Please contact us for a free estimate and chance to discuss your project details. You will receive a detailed breakdown of the costs, timelines and a walk through all aspects of any job. The estimate will cost you nothing, but it will give you a chance to assess our qualifications better than any add can.

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Phone: 416-700-0056
Email: urbanprotoronto@gmail.com
Instagram: UrbanPro_Toronto
